hashflags-p1: Hashflags is a concept used by Twitter to refer to icons next to hashtags.
hashflags-p2: Only the really important and hot hashtags have Hashflags.
hashflags-p3: Hashflags only exist for a certain period of time before disappearing.
hashflags-p4: any hashflags from existing Twitter Campaigns.
hashflags-p5: Each time [Hide] and [Show] will random all hashflags again.
hashflags-p6: Fetching directly from Twitter without going through any API.
